entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
